ingredients.ingredient: ½ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes

cookingTips: Stir dry ingredients together, then add milk in one motion and stir just until combined
Drop spoonfuls onto baking sheet—these are drop biscuits, not rolled dough
Brush with melted butter immediately after baking for extra flavor and moisture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Drop biscuits are faster and more forgiving than traditional rolled biscuits. This recipe uses quick baking mix, making it very approachable. Are you looking for speed here, or would you like to learn a more from-scratch method?
